components.description:
A yellow face with furrowed eyebrows looking upwards with thumb and index finger resting on its chin. Intended to show a person pondering or deep in thought. Often used to question or scorn something or someone, as if saying Hmm, I don't know about that. Tone varies, including earnest, playful, puzzled, skeptical, and mocking.

May be paired with ðŸ’­ Thought Balloon or ðŸ’¡ Light Bulb to represent thinking, (having) ideas, and learning.

Joins ðŸ¤— Hugging Face, ðŸ¤« Shushing Face, and ðŸ¤­ Face With Hand Over Mouth as one of the few smileys featuring a hand.

title: Thinking Face

version.description: The Unicode Consortium has approved the following 41 emoji characters as part of Unicode 8.0, released on June 17, 2015. This is comprised of 37 new emojis, plus five emoji modifiers. Find out more about this update on the Emojipedia Blog.

emoji_net_data.category: Supplemental Symbols And Pictographs -> Emoticon faces
emoji_net_data.definition: A face shown with a single finger and thumb resting on the chin, glancing upward. Used to indicate thinking, or deep thought. Can be paired  http://emojipedia.org/thinking-face/
emoji_net_data.name: thinking face

bn:00083370v: To have or hold as a (personal) opinion; judge; think.
To have as opinion, belief, or idea.
Judge or regard; look upon; judge
To account; to esteem; to think; to judge; to hold in opinion; to regard. (Source Webster 1913)
To have as an opinion; to consider, suppose.

bn:00032600n: Part of the body at the front of the head
The face is a central organ of sense and is also very central in the expression of emotion among humans and among numerous other species.
Faces are the central sense organ complexes, for those animals that have one, normally on the ventral surface of the head.
The front of the human head from the forehead to the chin and ear to ear
The front part of the head, featuring the eyes, nose, and mouth and the surrounding area.

apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the thinking face emoji presents a classic yellow face with a distinctly pensive expression, its left eyebrow subtly raised and its right hand gently resting on its chin. Apple's signature glossy 3D shading creates a soft, rounded form, with realistic lighting that emphasizes its thoughtful contemplation. This emoji beautifully captures a moment of deep thought, consideration, or gentle questioning in digital conversations.
